title: Congress Rental Network
text:
Congress Rental Network (CRN) is a worldwide network of technology meeting specialists. As an organization, it aims to provide technical solutions, in regards to conference, <a href="congress">congress</a> and <a href="audiovisual">audiovisual</a> requirements for meetings and events. It is linked to conference equipment manufactured by German conglomerate <a href="Robert%20Bosch%20GmbH">Bosch</a>.
History.
CRN was created in 1990 with the first members to joining in, under the guidance of <a href="Philips">Philips</a> (at that time - now <a href="Robert%20Bosch%20GmbH">Bosch</a>), were located in Denmark, the Netherlands and Italy. It has been associated with <a href="G-20%20major%20economies">G20</a>'s meetings and with the <a href="International%20Association%20of%20Conference%20Interpreters">International Association of Conference Interpreters</a> (AIIC).
